price: 25. Ma waxaa Wacdiga lagu soo dejiyey isaga oo nalaga dhex doortay? Mayee, waa beenlow isla weyn5.
arabic: أَءُلۡقِيَ ٱلذِّكۡرُ عَلَيۡهِ مِنۢ بَيۡنِنَا بَلۡ هُوَ كَذَّابٌ أَشِرٞ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: a-ul'qiya al-dhik'ru ʿalayhi min bayninā bal huwa kadhābun ashirun
